foraging.description: The art of cutting down trees and vegetation, defenseless little vegetation. Don't you feel bad?

mining.description: Break your back and your hands slaving away at some rocks.

fishing.description: Uncover the mysteries of the sea.

combat.description: The art of cutting down not so defenseless vegetation (and monsters). Don't feel bad.

farming.description: Probably the most relaxing activity there is.

brewing.description: Bring out your inner witch. Harness the power of nature.

cooking.description: Delightful. Not much else to it.

crafting.description: Nothing in the world is made without combining a few sticks and stones together.
